page.title: 18RELIGION
page.content: {INTERVIEW WITH A CHESTERFIELD VICAR. As a vicar in the town of the famous {Crooked Spire,}my responsibility in Brampton is to be the{"Man of God".}I must try to bring God's love to all I meet and to all who seek it. I must always try to remember that in my dealings with other people, I am representing Jesus Christ, our Lord and Saviour.{Places of worship}are important because the family of God witness together in fellowship. They unite so that the church becomes a "home" for those who seek refuge and help. Churches will best{serve the {needs}of people in the future by being homes of stability within the community. People will be able to find recreation. The church will be a place of peace and quietness and people will continue to seek God and find Him there.
